title: Heroism
content:
ur's Gate 3. Heroism is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Enchantment school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Heroism Information in BG3

Description: Make yourself or a target immune to Frightened and gain 5 temporary hit points each turn Can only have temporary hit points from one source. Level: Lvl 1 spell School: Enchantment School Casting Time: Action Range: Melee Requires Concentration: Yes
